Room.Name: Netherworld Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Netherworld Lane, south of the Traveller's Lodge.
Room.LongDescription: The Crimson Dragon Traveller's Lodge provides accomodations for just about anyone wandering in from outside the city. The lodge also provides information about travel conditions and possible locations for raids and other looters. The eastern gate is the most popular entrance and exit out of the city, and usually the safest as it is the most travelled.
